attributes.action: Please lower TIER 2 Fees for Visa Renewals/ILR/Permanent Residency.
attributes.additional_details: After ILR comes PR, Citizenship etc. Once a family does all these and come forward his/her family is in a huge debt. This situation should change. All because of this Nurses dont stay in UK, they jump to other countries and thats why there is shortage of this occupation. They are to be treated nicely and government should show interest in this matter to support the existing NHS nurses and do something for their well being.
attributes.background: Nurses who come from abroad leaving all their loved ones are to be considered, rather than being ignored. Once they come here they bring their spouse and kids. Husbands do part time and look after kids. The renewal fee for Tier 2 is too much, they make it some how, soon after that comes ILR.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly sure whether you want visa fees reduced for everyone or just for nurses. 
	
You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
